keyPolicies.policyDescription: Will fight to save Purley Pool from Tory council closing plans; keep it open and develop the site to private developers.
Offer 18-24 year olds out of work, education or training a guaranteed job, funded by the tax on bankers' bonuses.
Focusing on getting more bobbies on the beat as a priority for Labour. Investments have led to an increase in police officers and Community Support Officers.

issues.economy: If we'd repeated the mistakes of the Tory recession in the 1990s, house repossessions and business failures would have been twice as high and another 1.7 million more people would have lost their jobs.
issues.environment: Commitment to secure environment and sustainability, including more frequent recycling and better street lighting.

housing.content: Outrageous claims for second homes, even here in Croydon

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm proud to be Labour's candidate in Croydon South. Politics has come to such disrepute in the last year with outrageous claims for second homes, even here in Croydon

contactInformation.address: Ruskin House, 23 Coombe Road, Croydon, CR0 1BD

endorsements.endorsement: Jane is a real community advocate so I am proud to back her. I know she will be a hardworking MP and will always put her constituency first.

images.caption: Jane with the Mayor of Croydon.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Unlike the sitting Tory MP, I live in your constituency in Croydon and will not claim for a second home or expenses.
